name: raoctober day 12 - "an assemblage of corporate synergies"
name_original: raoctober day 12 - "an assemblage of corporate synergies"
description:
I, Zinfandel,  have created  this very, very short experience as an  entry for day 12 of raoctober, following the day's theme, "an assemblage of corporate synergies". I hope you enjoy it  even though it is a bit of a plug.

The up and down arrow keys navigate dialog boxes.  Enter or Escape close dialog boxes. Enter also  selects a choice in dialog boxes if you have the cursor lined up with one.

Once you've decided between [k]eyboard/[m]ouse and [c]olor/[m]onochrome, close the Reconstruction of ZZT information box and press P at the game's title screen to play. Use the arrow keys to move your player around and walk into things to interact with them.

Today's game is a bit of a plug, so here are the links included in the game.

  • Phoebus Project on itch.io: https://ell-bc.itch.io/phoebus-projec
  • Phoebus Project on the Museum of ZZT: https://museumofzzt.com/file/p/PHOEBUS.zip
  • Mean Girls  Games on itch.io: https://itch.io/c/1139493/mean-girls-games
  • Zephyr's games on the Museum of ZZT: https://museumofzzt.com/search/?author=Zephyr
  • kkairos's games on  the Museum of ZZT: https://museumofzzt.com/search/?author=KKairos
  • WiL's games on the Museum of ZZT: https://museumofzzt.com/search/?author=WiL
  • The Museum of ZZT's homepage: http://museumofzzt.com/
